header.title: User Quota
header.exceededNotice: Quota exceeded, please contact administrator for assistance

5h.label: 5-Hour Rolling
5h.description: Tracks spending from the past 5 hours, rolling updates hourly

weekly.label: Weekly Reset
weekly.description: Calendar week (resets Monday 00:00), tracks entire week

monthly.label: Monthly Reset
monthly.description: Calendar month (resets on 1st of month 00:00), tracks entire month

daily.label: Daily Reset
daily.description: Calendar day (resets daily 00:00), tracks by day
